snippet: The death toll in the bombing raid on a Doctors Without Borders Hospital in Kunduz has risen again, and civilian casualties have been confirmed.
abstract: Afghanistan's American commander Gen John F Campbell appoints two-star general from another command to investigate bombing of Doctors Without Borders hospital in Kunduz, Afghanistan; move comes as report confirms civilian casualties from attack has risen to 23 killed with 3 others presumed dead.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The death toll in the bombing raid on a Doctors Without Borders Hospital in Kunduz has risen again, and civilian casualties have been confirmed.

headline.print_headline: General to Investigate U.S. Airstrike on Doctors Without Borders Hospital
headline.main: General to Investigate U.S. Airstrike on Doctors Without Borders Hospital
